::DarkMouse:;

"You shoot me and the autoguns blast you into oblivian.  I'd say we 
have a Cybertron stand off.  If you would lower your gun, and we talk 
this over, we get more accoplished. If not, the we are both dead. And 
you won't get your little device that you want. Got it? Now then, 
it's up to you."
She looked at Dracona and up at the autoguns aimed at Dracona.  
Despite her size, the guns would kill her in nanoseconds. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Dracona pulled out her rifle and placed it against Dark Mouse's 
face.
> 
> "Look, just let me go and you won't get hurt, I just came here to 
get my
> device, it's over there!" Dracona said, she kept her gun right in 
Dark
> Mouse's face, it was a Heavy Blaster Rifle, one Dracona made in her
> laboratory. Dracona looked at Dark Mouse with a look of sincerity...
